knimeNode.name: Peak Counter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Scans through the image and using buckets counts number of peaks. When it finds a white pixel, it creates a bucket. Continue on scanning, every following white pixel is added to the same bucket. When a black pixel is reached, the bucket is closed.
